donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The Global Joint UN-REDD Programme is focused on international support functions to support the country actions and provide the international community with confidence and understanding of the feasibility and options for including a REDD mechanism in a Post-Kyoto regime.
The programme design draws from the respective strengths of the partner agencies (UNDP/FAO/UNEP) in line with "Delivering As One" objectives and provides technical and scientific support as well as knowledge management.
Specifically, the international support functions aims to achieve the following outcomes by the end of 2009:

1: Improved guidance on Monitoring Assessment, Reporting and Verification (MARV) approaches (led by FAO).
2: Increased engagement of stakeholders in the REDD agenda (led by UNDP).
3: Improved analytical & technical framework of co-benefits for REDD decision makers (led by UNDPand UNEP).
4: Increased collaborative support between UN Agencies (co-led by the three agencies).

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
